enb_long_title: Second Conference of the Parties to the Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Upon considering SBSTAs cooperation with the IPCC, many delegations, including the EU, AUSTRALIA, the US, CANADA and MYANMAR, endorsed the IPCCs efforts.
The RUSSIAN FEDERATION sought clarification of SBSTAs relationship to the IPCC concerning the use of its data.
No formal decision was taken on this issue.
It will be considered at future SBSTA sessions.
